title: pUraNa yOga
sahitya:
pUraNa yOga mahEshvari tAyE bhuvanEshvari gati nIyE ammA


anupallavi

  nAraNi jIvOddhAriNiyE shiva nAyakiyE mOkSadAyakiyE shakti


caraNam 1    vIrarin vIramum vittagar jnAnamum vEdattin sAramum nIyE
tAraka nAmamum dharmArtha kAmamum sajjanar kSEmamum nIyE shakti
    caraNam 2    haran aruLAgavE ain tozhil purindiDum Adi parAshakti nIyE
varadAyaki shuddha gauri manOnmaNi vAcAmagOcari nIyE shakti
